summary.title: pitrix
summary.description: threat model for pitrix case study

data.name: User
data.description: System that interacts with the mobile application in order to send and receive data

threats.title: API Spoofing
threats.description: An attacker could impersonate the External API, tricking the mobile app into sending sensitive data to a malicious acto
threats.mitigation: Implement mutual authentication between the mobile app and the API using strong encryption methods

data.name: Cyber Threat
data.description: Attackers trying to exploit the vulnerabilities of the system.

data.name: Vehicle Performance Data
data.description: Stores a handful of relevant information which is used by the system to provide information for the user

data.name: Vehicle Tracking Devices
data.description: Real-time tracking systems that provide location and performance data to the data center for processing later on

threats.title: Spoofing
threats.description: An attacker could impersonate a vehicle tracking device, sending fake location data to the data center
threats.mitigation: Use strong authentication for vehicle tracking devices

data.name: Data Center
data.description: The system which processes all the data from navigation data, driver feedback, weather data and  behicle performance data

threats.title: Overload
threats.description: A DDoS attack could overwhelm the data center, disrupting critical services like real-time tracking and telemetry analysis
threats.mitigation: Deploy DDoS mitigation services and load balancers to distribute traffic across multiple servers

data.name: Mobile app
data.description: The application which communicates with the external API in order to gather data and respon with appropiate information for the user

data.name: Background Worker
data.description: Handles asynchronous tasks such as updates, maintenance breaks or background data processing

threats.title: New STRIDE threat
threats.description: An attacker could exploit vulnerabilities in the background worker process to gain unauthorised access to critical system functions
threats.mitigation: Implement role-based access control and monitor all access to privileged functions

data.name: Weather Update
data.description: Retrieval of data related to weather to use for route planning

threats.title: Denial of Service
threats.description: Attackers could flood the mobile app with requests, rendering the service unavailable for legitimate users
threats.mitigation: Implement rate limiting, monitoring, and filtering to detect and block suspicious activity

data.name: Telemetry Data
data.description: Mobile application sends telemetry data to the data center for analysis

threats.title: Data Tampering
threats.description: An attacker may modify telemetry data in transit between the mobile app and data center, leading to inaccurate diagnostics or tracking
threats.mitigation: Ensure end-to-end encryption and integrity checks on telemetry data in transit

data.name: Malware Injection
data.description: Attempts from attackers to inject malware into the devices to disrupt the real-time retrieval of data

threats.title: Cyber threat attacks
threats.description: Cyber threat actors could inject malware into the vehicle tracking devices, disrupting the accuracy of real-time data and tracking
threats.mitigation: Implement security controls such as application whitelisting and regular software patching on vehicle tracking devices

data.name: Feedback Retrieval
data.description: Feedback collected from registered drivers in order to improve the system and application

threats.title: Modification of Feedback
threats.description: Malicious actors could modify driver feedback data
threats.mitigation: Enforce access control on feedback data and have integrity checks to ensure data has not been altered

data.name: Real-Time Data
data.description: Live data from the systems are sent to the data center for analysis

threats.title: Data Interception
threats.description: Attackers could intercept real-time data from the vehicle tracking devices, potentially exposing sensitive location and vehicle performance information
threats.mitigation: Use strong encryption for all data transmissions from vehicle tracking devices and implement secure key management

data.name: API Gateway
data.description: The communication between the mobile application and the external API for retrieval of data

threats.title: API information disclosure
threats.description: Sensitive information from API requests may be exposed if proper encryption and security measures are not in place
threats.mitigation: Ensure that all API requests and responses are encrypted

threats.title: API request denial
threats.description: Attackers could launch a Denial of Service attack against the API, disrupting communications between the mobile app and external services
threats.mitigation: Use rate limiting, API gateway protection, and monitoring to detect and block abnormal traffic

data.name: Data Update
data.description: Updates to route and map data between the navigation store to the data center

data.name: Navigation Data
data.description: Provides route and map data in order to enhance route planning and tracking systems

threats.title: Breach of data
threats.description: Navigation data could be exposed, allowing an attacker to track a vehicles movements or exploit routing information
threats.mitigation: Encrypt navigation data both at rest and in transit and ensure data is only shared with authorised users and services

data.name: Driver Feedback
data.description: Contains feedback from drivers registered on the system which is then used to improve the system or fix any issues withing the mobile application

data.name: Weather Data
data.description: Stores real-time  information on the weather which is useful for route planning and safety for users

threats.title: Weather data tampering
threats.description: Attackers may alter weather data, which could result in unsafe route recommendations or vehicle operations
threats.mitigation: Use encrypted channels to retrieve and update weather data

data.name: Data Tampering
data.description: Cyber threasts attempting to modify or corrupt data

threats.title: Unauthorised Modification
threats.description: An attacker could gain access to the vehicle performance data store and tamper with critical vehicle performance metrics, leading to misleading diagnostics or recommendations
threats.mitigation: Implement strict access control and regular integrity checks on the data store and log all access attempts
